page.title: 14Games we play (i)
page.content: a){Rounders}:a ball game.You have to hit the ball and run to first post,(or if it's a good hit, further) without getting stumped or caught out. b){Forty-Forty}:is a bit like hide & seek.Someone counts to forty, and the others hide.Then you have to run to where the other person is counting and say "Forty Forty release all" without he or she spotting you. c){Skipping}:is a rope game. Two people swing the rope and the others jump the rope to rhymes e.g. " Bumper car, bumper car, No. 48 Whizzing round the corrrrrrner Slamming on the brakes." d){Elastic}:for elastic you have to jump onto elastic held by two others, jumping in different ways and at different heights. CONTINUED ON PAGE 15......
